title: Playful...yet professional typeface
content: I am designing a catalog for a company that is touting Disney licensing. Because it is Disney, I want to use a slightly more playful font for headers, etc. I was using Swiss 721 Rounded, but got some complaints about it being too "bubbly." Any other suggestions? Thanks.
author: julia.warren

comments.content:
Try [Vista Sans](http://web.archive.org/web/20150131192608/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/downloads/emigre/vista_sans_package_three/) alternates. Clean, professional, and fun. I have found Vista Sans to be an incredibly versatile face.

Enjoy!
<cite>Try Vista Sans alternates.</cite> I was going to suggest that too, so I'll second it!

I'll third Vista Sans. If you need something more playful, [MVB Grenadine](http://web.archive.org/web/20150131192608/http:/www.fontshop.com/search/?q=Grenadine) and [MVB Pedestria](http://web.archive.org/web/20150131192608/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/downloads/mvb_fonts/mvb_pedestria/) are bouncy but not blobby or bubbly.
[Shannon](http://web.archive.org/web/20150131192608/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/singles/creative_alliance/shannon_book) may be worth a look. It's a bit like Frutiger on a weekend :)
Thanks guys, I love these recommendations.
